From: Naeem Inamdar <Naeem.Inamdar@chalhoub.com>
To: Hagop Ghazarian <Hagop.Ghazarian@chalhoub.com>; Sharon Pinto <Sharon.Pinto@chalhoub.com>
CC: Retail Operations UAE <Retail.Operations.UAE@chalhoub.com>

Date: 2025-05-28 12:20
Subject: Trade License and Insurance Certificate (Property All Risk & Public Liability) Submission - MEMO/DCC/B-2/2025/00000412-011
--------------------------------------------------
Dear Hagop / Sharon,

 

Could you please share the documents ASAP as requested by the MAF mall management so that I can share the same with them to avoid legal actions.

 

Regards

 

Trade License and Insurance Certificate (Property All Risk & Public Liability) Submission

MEMO/DCC/B-2/2025/00000412-011

Attention To : All

Cc To : -

Guess

Trade License and Insurance Certificate (Property All Risk & Public Liability) Submission

28-May-2025





 

 

 

Dear Valued Partner,

 

In accordance with the terms of your Lease Agreement with Majid Al Futtaim Properties, we kindly request that you provide an updated Trade License & Insurance Certificate for your store and storage areas.

Please note that failure to comply with this requirement constitutes a breach of the Lease Agreement and may result in legal action under UAE law.

chunks.text:
In accordance with the terms of your Lease Agreement with Majid Al Futtaim Properties, we kindly request that you provide an updated Trade License & Insurance Certificate for your store and storage areas.

Please note that failure to comply with this requirement constitutes a breach of the Lease Agreement and may result in legal action under UAE law.

 

We appreciate your prompt attention to this matter and look forward to receiving the necessary documentation at the earliest.

Valid copies of the Trade License, and Insurance Certificates must be shared on an Annual basis to Mall Management.

 

Kindly forward the documents to the following email address  anna.valladarez@maf.ae <mailto:anna.valladarez@maf.ae>  / eilaine.pascual@maf.ae <mailto:eilaine.pascual@maf.ae> 

 

Thank you for your cooperation.

 

Kind Regards

 

Qaisar Abbas

 

NAEEM INAMDAR	
ASSOCIATE ‑ RSO	
ALLIED ENTERPRISES LLC	
DUBAI	
‑	
UNITED ARAB EMIRATES	
+971 4 563 2600	
	
 	
 <https://chalhoubgroup.com/>
